document.full_text: toshiba corp said an assembly line in japan making small liquid crystal displays would be closed for a month, and pc maker lenovo group ltd voiced worries over parts, highlighting the threat to global supply chains from japan's devastating earthquake.
document.title: toshiba lcd plant out, lenovo frets about supplies
lines_and_colors: toshiba corp said an assembly line in japan making small liquid crystal displays would be closed for a month, and pc maker lenovo group ltd voiced worries over parts, highlighting the threat to global supply chains from japan's devastating earthquake.
